job_description:
Company Description

Cappella is an innovative baby care technology brand that specializes in sustainable and tech-driven solutions for modern parenting. We offer an advanced baby monitoring system featuring a 2-phone setup and AI cry translation technology. Our products embody a blend of engineering excellence and a commitment to enhancing the emotional and physical well-being of families worldwide.

Role Description

This is a part-time remote role for an Experienced ML Engineer at Cappella. The candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing machine learning models to enhance the existing baby monitoring system. The job also entails developing new AI cry translation technology, collaborating with internal teams, and improving existing algorithms for better results. 20 hours / week.

Qualifications
• Strong knowledge in Computer Science, Neural Networks, and Statistics
• Hands-on experience in developing algorithms and Pattern Recognition
• Ability to work independently and efficiently
• Experience in developing and implementing machine learning models
• Experience in working with large data sets and optimizing performance
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Math, or related fields (Master’s preferred)

Qualifications: Strong knowledge in Computer Science, Neural Networks, and Statistics
Hands-on experience in developing algorithms and Pattern Recognition
Ability to work independently and efficiently
Experience in developing and implementing machine learning models
Experience in working with large data sets and optimizing performance
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Responsibilities: The candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing machine learning models to enhance the existing baby monitoring system
The job also entails developing new AI cry translation technology, collaborating with internal teams, and improving existing algorithms for better results
